name: Unicorn
baseMeaning: A mythical horse with a single horn on its forehead.
tldr: Represents uniqueness, magic, rarity, or something special. Also startup culture slang.

contextMeanings.meaning: Something unique, rare, or exceptionally special.
A billion-dollar startup or rare talent.

contextMeanings.meaning: Someone who has all the qualities you want (very rare).

Used in fantasy makeup tutorials and unique content.

generationalNotes.note: Used to describe uniqueness or fantasy aesthetics.
Often associated with startup culture and 'unicorn companies.'
May interpret as childish or fantastical.
